name: Cloned
description:
CLONED is just a small platformer about a man and a clone

Controls

  • use WASD or ARROWS to move

Story

You are going for a walk in the woods when suddently a clone of you appears and he copies your exact movments. try to escape but never lose sight of him

this game was made for the Mini Jam 111

I'm sorry if this is a bad page but i made it at 3 AM
